job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: MUST HAVES:-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5+ Python software development for composition and modularity, debugging and following tracebacks-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong stats background and concepts including hypothesis testing, correlation, R squared, P-value-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Pytorch -&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Tensorflow functional API, deep learning-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Mathematics of machine learning- linear algebra, multivariable calculus -&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SQL querying -&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hyperparameter optimization, regularizing regression models    PLUSSES:-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Masters or PhD- HIGHLY preferred!! -&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ecommerce experience &nbsp;DAY TO DAY:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A company is looking for a Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer to sit remotely within the US.&nbsp;We follow industry standard practices for managing, collaboration, deployment and testing.&nbsp;We deploy and interact with resources on AWS.&nbsp;Responsibilities include:• Analyze large data sets by quantifying the data quality, identifying particular patterns, and visualizing results • Understand business problems and identify the right data sets and ML/Statistical approach to produce the desired outcomes • Adapt to account for changes and be able to propose alternative approaches • Ideate and develop analytics and modeling solutions cross-functionally to build customized, long-term, and sustainable solutions • Provide critical thought leadership and enhance organizational capabilities • Own machine learning pipelines end-to-end • Write production-grade machine learning code using standard engineering practices and deploy models to production • Improve codebase and lead/participate in code reviews with Research Scientists and Data Scientists • Help non-engineers develop their engineering skills • Mentor junior team members and contribute to a culture where everyone is valued
